title: FANDEE Women's 2025 Maxi Dress - Solid Color Bohemian Summer Long Maxi Dress V-Neck 3/4 Sleeve
description: 【Premium Fabric】Crafted from a blend of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, our dresses for women offers the ultimate in softness, comfort, breathability, and opacity. You'll love the value for your money - it's exactly what you're looking for.

【Sizes & Easy Care】With a wide range of sizes, it's effortless to find your perfect fit in this maxi dress. Measure your bust, waist, sleeves, and length to make a precise selection. Before checking out, be sure to refer to our size chart. And when it's laundry time, just pop it in the washer on a gentle cycle with cold water.

【Distinctive Features】Worried about your maxi dress for women stretching out? Don't be! Our high-waist design ensures it stays put. Tie the strings into a cute bow or knot for a flattering fit. This maxi dress flatters most body types, giving you a look you'll love.

【Standout Highlights】This casual maxi dress has everything you need - pockets, a V-neckline, 3/4 sleeves, and a floor-skimming hem. The V-neck shows off your beautiful neckline and collarbones, while the pockets are perfect for your phone or other essentials.

【Versatile for Multiple Occasions】Whether you're heading to the beach, a cocktail party, or just running around town, this bohemian-style floral sun dress is your go-to choice. It's perfect for weddings, graduations, family reunions, and any other event on your calendar.
